channel.title: I want to spawn only one npc at a time please read
channel.description:
okay my question is how can make it so you can only spawn one npc at a time?
I am using this
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,349437.msg2686195.html#msg2686195]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,349437.msg2686195.html#msg2686195[/url]
to be able to add summoning to my 317 but the problem is you can spawn so many npcs that the server ends up crashing can someone help please?
